Package org.apache.lenya.ac.file

Class Summary
FileAccreditableManager File-based accreditable manager.
FileGroup File-based group implementation.
FileGroupManager File-based group manager.
FileIPRange IP range that is stored in a file.
FileIPRangeManager Manager for IP address ranges.
FileItemManager Abstract superclass for classes that manage items loaded from configuration files.
FileItemManager.DirectoryChangeNotifier Helper class to observe a directory for changes.
FilePolicyManager A PolicyBuilder is used to build policies.
FileRole File-based role implementation.
FileRoleManager File-based role manager implementation.
FileUser File-based user implementation.
FileUserManager File-based user manager implementation.
